mapper.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(bname) <= 10 THEN bname ELSE SUBSTR(bname, 1, 10) || '...' END AS bname
mapper.select: FROM (SELECT id, fal_time extime, save_loc FROM fallowtab ft, membertab mt, profilepictab ppt WHERE fallow_no = ${mno} AND fallower_no = mt.mno AND ppt.mno = mt.mno AND ischeck = 'Y' AND mt.isshow = 'Y' AND ppt.isshow = 'Y' )

, bname, pno FROM (SELECT pt.pno, id, lk_time extime, save_loc,
FROM poststab pt, booktab bt, liketab lt, membertab mt, profilepictab ppt WHERE pt.bno = bt.bno AND pt.isshow = 'Y' AND pt.mno = ${mno} AND ppt.mno = mt.mno AND mt.isshow = 'Y' AND ppt.isshow = 'Y' AND pt.pno = lt.pno AND mt.mno = lt.mno AND ischeck = 'Y' AND lt.mno != ${mno} )

, bname, pno FROM (SELECT pt.pno, id, cdate extime, save_loc,
FROM poststab pt, booktab bt, commenttab ct, membertab mt, profilepictab ppt WHERE pt.bno = bt.bno AND pt.isshow = 'Y' AND pt.mno = ${mno} AND ppt.mno = mt.mno AND mt.isshow = 'Y' AND ppt.isshow = 'Y' AND pt.pno = ct.pno AND mt.mno = ct.mno AND ct.isshow = 'Y' AND ct.mno != ${mno} )
